name: Tank Warfare (Young Gamers Co.)
description:
Welcome to Tank Warfare! In this RPG, you take control of a tank. Use your tank to blast the enemy tank to bits! One you reach 1000 gold, you can upgrade your armor or speed. So, the longer you play, the better your tank will be!

Controls:

WSAD to move around the battlefield

SPACE  and LEFT CLICK to shoot

Mouse to move turret and click buttons

Here is the main menu:

You control the green tank, and the yellow tank is your opponent.

This is Young Gamers Co.'s first professional video game. Young Gamers Co. is a company that specializes in 2-D, pixelated games.

Credits:

Coding by: calebtristan5000

Art by: calebtristan5000

Sound by: PaulRHJT and Scratch

Please leave a review if you like the game. If you have a problem or comment, please write it in the comments.
